title: 10 incredible sales happening online this week
text:
10 incredible sales happening online this week

Here are the best deals happening for the week of October 14. (Photo: Everlane / Sur la Table)

— Our editors review and recommend products to help you buy the stuff you need. If you make a purchase by clicking one of our links, we may earn a small share of the revenue. However, our picks and opinions are independent from USA Today’s newsroom and any business incentives.

Sales are happening all the time, you just have to know where to look. Of the hundreds (if not thousands) of price drops that happen daily, some are better than the rest, but unless you're constantly watching over your spam folder, you'd never know they were happening.

More: 77 top-rated Halloween costumes for every type of person

Staying on top of every sale is no easy feat, but our team is dedicated to bringing you coverage of the best online sales happening now. Here are some of the best we've seen happening for the week of October 14, 2019.

1. Shop and save at Wayfair

It may only be October, but it's never too early to think about the holidays. (Photo: Wayfair)

Searching for new furnishings to make your home warmer and more inviting? Wayfair is one of the best spots to shop. Whether you're looking for a new sofa or holiday decor, the site has a little something for everyone. Right now, you can actually save on a variety of sales, including their Head Start Holiday sale, which includes up to 70% off festive decor, wreaths, stockings, Christmas trees, and more. Not only that, but you can get up to 50% off Halloween decor and party essentials. Their massive Fall Refresh Sale is still happening too, in addition to getting 50% off everything in their warehouse clearance section.

Shop on Wayfair and save up to 70% off

2. Snag huge savings at Anthropologie

Save on the some of the most popular home decor items Anthro has to offer. (Photo: Anthropologie)

Paying full price at Anthropologie? Just don't even bother. If you wait it out, you can find all kinds of deals during one of their sale-on-sale events (which happen pretty often). Anthro is a veritable treasure trove of cute boho chic styles, and for today, you can take an extra 40% off sale items, which is ridiculous. You can also snag an additional 20% off select furniture, decor, and bedding if you shop now, so it's definitely worth checking out.

Shop at Anthropologie now

3. Get 50% off during REI's end of season sale

Save on camping essentials and top brands like Patagonia during this huge clearance sale. (Photo: Therm-a-Rest / Patagonia)

You don't have to be an avid outdoors lover to enjoy shopping at REI, but it can definitely help, and right now you can snag discounts on all kinds of stuff at REI, from Patagonia's insanely popular Better Sweaters ($49, down from $100) to Hydro Flask water bottles ($24, down from $33) to camping gear and sports bras and shoes and more. It's all thanks to their massive end-of-season sale, where you can snag up to 50% off a variety of marked-down items. Even if you're not super outdoorsy, there are plenty of interesting items among our top picks. (FYI: they can also make great holiday gifts.)

Shop the end-of-season REI sale

4. Get 20% off at L.L.Bean

Snuggle up and save with this sale happening at L.L.Bean. (Photo: L.L. Bean)

Flannel, boots, moccasins and more—these are just a few of the things that leap to mind when I think about L.L.Bean as it is, regardless of the time of year. With fall underway, there's even more reason to have flannel and other assorted Bean apparel in mind, and you can still save right now if you head to the site. Today's the last day to get 20% off outerwear, clothing, and footwear with the promo code BEAN20. This even includes Bean Boots, which tend to actually sell out this time of year, so you should absolutely grab a pair while you still can.

Shop the L.L. Bean sale

5. Take up to 70% off at Sur la Table

Sur La Table is having an insane sale right now that you definitely don't want to miss. (Photo: Sur La Table)

You'll have a lot of reasons to spend time in your kitchen over the next few months. From Halloween treats to Christmas feasts, the savory dishes you're bound to create throughout the season mean you'll definitely need a fully stocked kitchen. Whether you need new pots and pans, appliances, dutch ovens, or what have you, Sur la Table's Anniversary Sale is the perfect excuse to upgrade your collection of kitchen essentials, since you can save up to 70% on a variety of popular cooking brands, including Staub, All-Clad, Le Creuset, and many more, so don't miss out.

Shop the Sur La Table Anniversary Sale

6. Shop the sale-on-sale at Madewell

Madewell sales are an extra joyous occasion. (Photo: Madewell)

Madewell makes some of the best denim ever, and their handbags (specifically, their totes) are absolutely perfect for work. Case in point, seems like almost every woman in my office has one of their bags. Right now, Madewell is actually running a sale, which is rare. You can get an extra 20% off sale items, so if you've been meaning to upgrade your fall look, this sale is must shop.

Shop the Madewell sale-on-sale

7. Sweet dreams and sweeter savings with Nectar

Have your most peaceful sleep yet knowing that you saved on a brand new mattress. (Photo: Nectar)

You never want to underestimate the power of a good night's sleep. Investing in a high-quality mattress can make all the difference, not just in how you sleep, but how you feel the following day. Nectar makes one of the best mattresses in a box that we've ever tested, plus it's more affordable than other popular alternatives like Casper and Purple. Here's the best part: you can save even more on a Nectar mattress right now, because they've prolonged their Columbus Day sale. You can get $100 off any purchase of $500 or more, plus two pillows, which are worth $150 if bought separately.

Shop the Nectar mattress sale

8. Choose what you want to pay at Everlane

At Everlane, you can still grab some amazing products with the "Choose what you pay " sale. (Photo: Everlane)

Everlane's Choose What You Pay sale has been happening off and on for a while, but it's still one of the most creative sales that we've ever seen. Essentially, you have the option to pick the price of select Everlane products (including shoes and apparel), and on the site, Everlane breaks down where your cash is actually going. For example, you can get these Modern Points, made from real Italian leather, for $93 (which, the site explains, covers the basic cost to develop, produce, and fulfill the product), $109 or $124, with explanations for the cost included for each. It's a really innovative approach to doing a sale, and one that you should definitely take advantage of while you can, since Everlane products are almost never available at a discount, unless you shop through Poshmark.

Shop the Choose What You Pay sale at Everlane now

9. Get an extra 40% off sale items at Urban Outfitters

You can save right now at Urban Outfitters on tons of cute stuff for around the house. (Photo: Urban Outfitters)

Urban Outfitters is like Anthropologie's younger, trendier little sister, and right now, it's also hosting a pretty sweet sale. Whether you're looking for new fall clothes or furnishings for your apartment, you can get up to 40% off on sale items at Urban Outfitters right now. But the discounts don't stop there. You can also get 50% off hundreds of regularly priced items for today, and online only.

Shop the sale-on-sale at Urban Outfitters now

10. Deal alert: Save up to 50% off at Shutterfly

Print out your most cherished photo memories with Shutterfly. (Photo: Reviewed / Jackson Ruckar)

We're all so glued to our phones these days, the idea of having actual pictures (instead of just pics snapped on your phone) might seem unnecessary. But truthfully, there are plenty of moments where it makes sense to have a real physical picture hanging up somewhere in the house. From an engagement to a wedding, new home, pregnancy announcement, graduation, and more, these precious milestones make for the sort of photos you'll want to have forever. And right now, you can save up o 50% on everything (including 50% off hardcover photo books and cards) with no promo code needed at Shutterfly, our favorite photo printing service. You can can also get free shipping on orders over $39 with the promo code SHIP39, so it's a great time to snap and save.

Get 50% off everything at Shutterfly

The product experts at Reviewed have all your shopping needs covered. Follow Reviewed on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram for the latest deals, reviews, and more.

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time.
